name: Necro-Mart
description:
FORGOT TO MENTION IN THE TUTORIAL: SHOOT UNWANTED OBJECTS TO DESTROY THEM AND SPAWN A NEW ONE

Hello Players,

Complete your shopping list, kill necromancers and don't get killed at Necro-Mart!
